reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and informative. She makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! His coding assignments are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Decent lectures, but the workload can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia's passion for history is contagious. His anecdotes make the class very interesting.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Lectures are hard to follow. More practical examples would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher. Makes even the most difficult concepts understandable.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's analysis of literary works is insightful. Assignments encourage critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes moves too fast through complex topics.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging discussions and relevant case studies. Dr. Rodriguez is an inspiration.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of economic theories. Real-world applications are particularly useful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Interesting content, but the pace of the class can be slow at times.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures and debates. Prof. Petrov encourages diverse viewpoints.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Field trips add great value to the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Struggles to explain complex concepts. More practical exercises would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and teacher. Dr. Martinez makes neuroscience accessible and exciting.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good theoretical knowledge, but could use more real-world business examples.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Dr. Thompson's enthusiasm for languages is infectious.

reviews.subject: African Studies
reviews.review: Incredibly knowledgeable. Prof. Okafor provides a comprehensive view of African history and culture.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding classes. Dr. Müller encourages deep, critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Solid foundational knowledge, but could incorporate more current marketing trends.
